description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8sfen","text":"A modified protocol using EVTrap beads (Tymora Analytical) to isolate EVs from human urine, and subsequent processing, for detection of proteins using SiMOA or comparable ELISA-based protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Disease Research

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ofg4","text":"    Prechill the AVANTI centrifuge, add adapters (Prechilled).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ommg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cpbkn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":107},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":112},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":115}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d1uk1","text":"Do a pre-run with 10 of 15 mL conical tubes with water, to check for breakage or plastic warping), run for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bpto2","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"},"1":{"data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"centrifuge"},"2":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euckg","text":"Thaw the urine in a shaking water bath at     . Leave the urine tubes  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5qu3s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1oai4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"100","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8rlfa","text":"Do not thaw at room temperature or in a refrigerated environment","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9uga","text":"Aliquot 250uL of urine into labeled 1.5mL tubes for creatinine measurements.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j8nl","text":"Transfer 5mL of urine to labeled 15mL conical tubes (keep tubes   )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3qti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"593df","text":"Add ddH2O to each urine sample tube until volume reaches 7mL (keep   )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4km55","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f25cd","text":"Centrifuge urine at    for   at  to remove debris and large apoptotic bodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7t46m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":0,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":0,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50irt","text":"Collect the cleared urine (keep   ), leaving the pellet behind (keep   ). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"br577","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56tjp","text":"Add the provided 10x Urine/Media Loading Buffer at 1-to-10 ratio to the urine sample (e.g. 700uL to 7mL urine). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fdif7","text":"Add 60uL Tymora EVtrap beads reagent. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26nbv","text":"Incubate for   by end-over-end rotation at    (make sure the beads freely move around). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4s6ct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34g4k","text":"Spin samples at low speed,   (but, use 500x g if you don’t see the right compact pellet) for  . Check for compact pellet at bottom of tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5129c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5aon","text":"Prepare the washing buffer by diluting the 10x Urine/Media Loading Buffer at 1-to-10 ratio in PBS (e.g. 2mL buffer to 20mL PBS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3e73","text":"Remove supernatant and transfer to temporary tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fl7s8","text":"Transfer beads to a labeled 1.5mL tube in 1mL of wash buffer (1x washing buffer) by inverting the beads 10-20 times and removing the wash solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":81,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aekql","text":"Transfer supernatant back to original 15mL tube and save in    .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"86um5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dvdo","text":"Isolate beads using magnetic separator and remove the wash solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5glmv","text":"Repeat wash step with cold PBS two more times, 1 mL each wash. Invert 10 times each. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"969qf","text":"Pulse spin (to get liquid out of cap). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sctn","text":"Add 50 μL of the fresh Tymora Elution solution to the beads (the elution volume should be enough to fully resuspend the beads and allow for efficient interaction) and incubate beads   by vigorous shaking at   (eppemixer) at    . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":182,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":207,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":224,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4pt7b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28fnd","text":"Place tube on a magnetic separator and collect elution buffer (~50ul) (this contains the EVs). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kh5j","text":"Repeat the elution step one more time with another 50uL of Tymora Elution solution and combine both elutions together. (~100uL) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c73kk","text":"Adjust pH to 7.4 using 1N HCl (make fresh, very carefully!) (7uL of acid per 100uL of elution solution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"280ha","text":"Add 200 uL of Quanterix Homebrew sample diluent buffer (supplemented with 0.1% sodium dodecyl sulfate, 0.05% sodium deoxycholate, and 0.4 mM freshly prepared dithiothreitol). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a96t6","text":"If the sample is ice, sonicate sample 10sec at 10% power straight. \u003e5 min wait on ice. 10sec at 10% power straight.  (~20 sec of straight 10% probe-tip sonication).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djj3d","text":"Aliquot half of sample to a labeled 1.5mL Protein Low-Binding tube and store at   for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dbfdi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

title: EVTrap non-antibody affinity bead protocol for EV isolation from urine, compatible with SiMOA assays
